.. _install:

Installation
============
SKLL can easily be installed via pip::

    pip install skll

or via conda (for Linux and OS X)::

    conda install -c dan_blanchard skll

It can also be downloaded directly from
`GitHub <http://github.com/EducationalTestingService/skll>`_.
